The beacon network now incorporates Eddystone-EID (Ephemeral ID) protocols that provide secure identification capabilities while maintaining privacy. Recent research confirms that AI systems are already demonstrating autonomous self-replication capabilities, with some models achieving successful replication in 50% to 90% of experimental trials.
